summary: The lighter choice for Dragon Ass-Bashing...
descriptionHtml:
Upon request, retextured the horns of the Drgonscale helmet to actually match the rest of it.
Also added \"Dovahkiin\" in Nordic runes at the front,
              very subtle though... None of that \'BOOM! In your face!\' kinda stuff.

It has occurred to me that they weren\'t intended to be metal, just how the gradient of the dragonscales has somehow darkened...

Anywho, give it a go and endorse if you likey!

INSTALLATION:
As ever, simply unpack and drop into your Skyrim/Data/Textures folder. Then kick Alduin\'s scaly backside!

To uninstall (Nooo!), simply delete the folder!
author: Gooneacehole
